name: SCP-[REDACTED]
description:
A game focused on the events after the containment breach of SCP-[Redacted], suspicion is placed on you, and depending on your answers, The Foundation will decide on your fate. Prove Your Innocence

This visual novel is based on the SCP Foundation Entry 096-1A1 by Dr. Dan.

Link to the SCP article: http://www.scp-wiki.net/scp-096

Legal: Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from http://www.scp-wiki.net and its authors. This game, being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0
